title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 361-8.5 - Design and operating requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 361-8.5 - Design and operating requirements

State Regulations
A processing facility required to obtain a permit must, in addition to the requirements identified in section
360.19
of this Title, design and
operate the facility in compliance with the design and operating requirements
in section
361-8.3
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
361-8.5

Adopted

New

York State Register September 20, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 38, eff. 11/4/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
